scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.make-client: npm run build-common && npm run build-client && cpr client/build client/lib --overwrite --delete-first && cpr common/build client/lib --overwrite
scripts.make-server: npm run build-common && npm run build-server && cpr server/build server/lib --overwrite --delete-first && cpr common/build server/lib --overwrite
scripts.typings-install: npm run typings-install-common && npm run typings-install-client && npm run typings-install-server
